name: Listing API
description:
**Note:** This is a [ ![Limited Release](/cms/img/docs/partners-api.svg)(Limited Release)](https://developer.ebay.com/api-docs/static/versioning.html#limited) API available only to select developers approved by business units.

Enables a seller adding an ad or item on a Partner's site to automatically create an eBay listing draft using the item details from the Partner's site.
